dct_description_sm: This polygon data layer represents community areas for Chicago, Illinois in 2003. The dataset was originally published by the City of Chicago Innovation and Technology Department-GIS Program in 2003.
dct_creator_sm: City of Chicago Innovation and Technology Department-GIS Program
